buddy_profile.name: Claire Kolly
buddy_profile.title: HR Consulting & Executive Coaching - EDLT.global
buddy_profile.introduction: Claire has spent more than 20 years in the HR field working in global environments, accompanying businesses in their -always complex!- development and transformations. Working across teams and cultural boundaries, she became passionate about helping teams and leaders navigate through changes and make sustainable decisions for themselves and their teams, balancing the short-term and long-term impacts in organisations. Back in 2016, she added a coaching hat to her HR experience, got trained and certified (PCC-ICF) with the idea that most of the time what employees and leaders are missing is a space to reconnect with what is really important for them, what makes them successful, or on the contrary slows them down.

career_progression.business_launch: 2021 - launched own executive HR and coaching business

buddy_profile.business_focus: Helping organizations and individuals develop the 'S' in ESG through sustainable, human-centred HR Practices, development programs and coaching
services: Climate change coaching for organizations and leaders
top_3_advice: Spend some time browsing and reading the materials. I really like the pragmatic approach taken by the TMI contributors, there is so much to learn!
Start small and don't freeze by thinking that the issue is too big - Start with small parts of a project and build around it. Take an iterative approach.
Give back - If you are grateful for all the information that you receive from TMI, share your feedback in return, and spread the knowledge. The more do-gooders, the better!
buddy_profile.how_to_help: People can reach out to me for HR/ People projects that they would like to embark on, any change they would like to engage in their organisation and are not sure of how it would work, I will be happy to share my experience, advice and coaching as I have faced a fair deal of HR challenges in various organisations.
buddy_profile.professional_philosophy: Making decisions that have a positive impact in the long run, for people, ecosystems and communities

post_covid_management_tips.outcome_focus: Focus on outcome more than daily tasks - trust people with clear direction and goals
post_covid_management_tips.flexibility_balance: Provide flexibility for better work-life balance - shorter meetings, no-meeting half-days, time between meetings
post_covid_management_tips.active_listening: Really listen to understand support needs - adapt responses to individual situations
post_covid_management_tips.golden_rule: Treat others the way you would like to be treated

sustainable_hr_approach.foundation: Culture and values - where they come from, how to embody them, help employees connect
sustainable_hr_approach.employee_commitment: Committed employee understands what they're doing, why it matters, how they contribute
sustainable_hr_approach.authenticity: Avoid 'HR greenwashing' - be genuine about commitments, walk the talk
sustainable_hr_approach.holistic_approach: Experiment, be genuine, don't over promise but be consistent

mental_health_focus.policy_coverage: Ensure treatments and specialist consultations covered by HR policies
mental_health_focus.eap_programs: Employee Assistance Programs for external counselling and support
mental_health_focus.coaching_support: Coaching for teams/individuals facing stress, burnout, change management
mental_health_focus.open_communication: Actively communicate 'it's ok not to be ok'
mental_health_focus.inclusion: Support minorities and address stigmas to ensure all feel valued

buddy_profile.covid_impact_insights: Pushed companies to rethink HR practices, accelerated trends that would have taken much longer, increased focus on well-being, resilience, flexible working
